products.name: Poäng Armchair
products.description: A comfortable armchair with a unique design, perfect for relaxation.

features: Durable frame made of high-quality materials.
Comfortable cushioning for extended seating.
Ergonomic design for optimal support.
Available in multiple upholstery options.
Assembly required; tools and instructions included.
details.careInstructions: Regularly vacuum or brush to remove dust. Clean with a damp cloth if necessary.

products.description: A sturdy bed frame with a minimalist design, available in various sizes.

details.careInstructions: Wipe clean with a damp cloth. Use mild soap if necessary. Dry with a clean cloth.
